description: An old building next to the Roman bridge Ponte Pietra, with a couple of romantic small balconies overlooking the river. Charming dining rooms provide the backdrop for regional cuisine with creative touches and a carefully selected wine list. An attractive apartment is also available for anyone wish to extend their stay here.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
